Package it.unicam.cs.followme.util

Class EntityBehaviourMonitor<E extends Entity,S extends Shape>

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.followme.util.EntityBehaviourMonitor<E,S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
BehaviourMonitor<E,S>
public class EntityBehaviourMonitor<E extends Entity,S extends Shape> extends Object implements BehaviourMonitor<E,S>
The EntityPositionMonitor class provides the implementation for a monitor that keeps tracking of all the entities movements and register all the conditions that are being signaled by those entities.
